title: No mid laner in new pool party group, why not Syndra?

embed.description: It's...Pool Party Syndra. Class project calendar page thingy for a month, hence "August" just ignore it or something. Lots of work still to be done. Loooooots of work. I guess it's a WIP then, but ...

body: I noticed that in the new Pool Party skin group (Draven, Lulu, Zac, Rek Sai), there is no mid laner, so I thought, I've seen Pool Party Syndra all over the place, and I like the idea of it.  I would love if Riot made a skin like that.  So, just pointing out an idea.

replies.body:
Yo Fuzzy Owl!

Lulu mid is still a thing, she's pretty versatile! But that being said we could pretty much make a pool party skin for any champion in the game, there isn't any specific champion that I can think of that wouldn't be a good fit for pool party. And that's where problems come up because tons of players ask why their main didn't get a pool party skin, because all of them could fit, lol.  It's just a matter of time before everyone has one and you guys are sick of the thematic. :P

I will never be sick of it. I think all the champs should have this skin, because it's a hilarious portrayal of the champs in a casual setting. I love it, and I absolutely want all the champs to have one. Please actually do that. Even the ones that "aren't that interesting" will be funny and fit right in.

I love it, and I absolutely want all the champs to have one. Please actually do that. Even the ones that "aren't that interesting" will be funny and fit right in.

I agree
Someone suggested a Pool Party {{champion:1}} where she just splashes water at you and Tibbers shows up by doing a cannonball

Please do not even think of sexualizing this skin, we don't need more psychos in this game.

We already have ADC mains and "muh skill cap" mains {{champion:92}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:7}} etc.

Kid swimsuits do not have to be sexualized, I don't think Riot would go there LOL
No one will get sick of Ahri, Kayle, Lux, and Sona in bikinis. Or whatever swimsuit works.
Ahri would look better in a one piece.
Debatable.

I'd say those designer ones with cutaways or revealing parts, if they go that way.

One piece doesn't always scream "sexy" but get the right one, and Ahri would look perfect.

> [{quoted}](name=Legacy of Xion,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=PHc5yd0M,comment-id=00030006,timestamp=2015-06-11T00:45:08.230+0000)

Everything but that disgusting Ahri
To each their own.
I don't know, could pool party jinx really work? She basically already is in a bikini, and what would super mega death rocket or chompers be?

well her rocket launcher would change to a water ballon launcher her mini gun to a squirt gun SMDR would probably turn into a large ball of water shot from a cannon similar to graves ulti and the chompers would be like sharks or croc's would be my guess.
Piranhas. Her chompers would be Piranhas. Its something Jinx would definitely do. Drop some carnivorous fish into the pool and watch the fun unfold.

SMDR could be a large foam float shot from a cannon.

Playing off of Celeste's suggestion: Chomper could be a Shark with little toy piranhas/blow up water fish balloons that come out of it.

Watch out when playing water polo.

The Dunks are real....
Pool Party Yorick?

> [{quoted}](name=TerraRising,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=PHc5yd0M,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-06-10T21:40:48.700+0000)
>
> Pool Party Yorick?

Pool Boy Yorick. Instead of a shovel he has a pool skimmer. Nailed it.

Never say such a thing. Its such a good idea. And if both teams wear pool party skins the summoners rift turns into a beach.
Pool party Darius pls.

that is a lie :P you cant really make a pool party anivia ;P that would just be an ice bird throwing water O_O, but the post is right i'd like syndra as pool party just cause then your throwing beach balls XD
_Well_...Technically knowing Rito they would probably make {{champion:34}} a seagull or pelican. :P
yo just make a pool party skin for every champ honestly its a theme that just works for everyone and so every player can get a summer feeling regardless who they main :D
That's pretty much what I tell everyone, any champion *could* have a pool party skin; best to keep it limited or else everyone will want one.
Just admit you forgot there was a character named Syndra in the game.
How would Pool Party Cho'Gath work?
It would kinda be like lochness chogath I think

~~Brand. Good luck making Pool Party Brand.~~

Wait.

Oh, hell. He can be working the BBQ. With Annie.

Corki? nah. Urgot. Yeah, there we go. Pool Party Urgot. I dare you.
He will just look like a crab :3

People dont get sick of pool parties pool parties get sick of people....
Similarly People dont get sick of snowdown skins snow down skins get tired of people.

It's Lulu duh. 

Draven: ADC
Mundo: Supp
Lulu: Mid
Rek: Top
Zac: JG
Where you possessed by the spirit of satan when you said that Mundo is supp?

Please remember where Mundo goes.

" Mundo goes where Mundo pleases"
Nope. I've seen it. So it's possible.

But that's such a bad idea though, its like trying to take aatrox as support (which I've seen but its definitely not "possible")
He uses health as mana without the minions to give it back via lifesteal and stuff; he also has minimal cc...
If someone wanted to use all of these in one game they would have to find someone else to mid than lulu or they'd lose.
I've seen that too! XD it's so great XD...said no one, but still out of the comp it's the way it is xD

or 
mundo: top
Rek: jungle
Zac: mid
Draaaaaaaaaaaaven: ADC
and Lulu: supp
"Hot Girls Not Allowed" - Riot, 2015
Sad but true. They even nerfed one of the most perfect splash arts because she looked too good. {{champion:55}}

The pool party battle still works imo
Top {{champion:58}} mid {{champion:115}} jungle {{champion:64}} adc {{champion:104}} support {{champion:89}} 
vs
Top {{champion:154}} mid {{champion:117}} jungle {{champion:421}} adc {{champion:119}} support {{champion:36}} ( I've seen people try this.....It kinda works. )
Lulu can still go mid, can't she?
am I the only one confused why we need 9 pool party skins? Has this ever happened before, or is this just where we're headed with skins?
There's actually ten.  Dr.Mundo one is coming out with the others (so it'll be Dr. Mundo, Draven, Rek'Sai, Lulu, and Zac to go along with Lee Sin, Renekton, Graves, Ziggs, and Leona).
sorry.
Sorry?  For what?  I was just letting you know there was another Pool Party skin.  IDK maybe you love Mundo and haven't seen it yet. xD
ziggs has a pool party skin
I'm fairly indifferent to the skin (Syndra has a lot of good skin ideas!) but I love the picture.  Especially the background events.
yeah but if lulu was mid thennnn there would be no support in the new poolparty skins. personally I want to see pool party yasuo, he has swim trunks and a life vest and uses a pool noodle as a sword.
I have seen {{champion:154}} go mid before.
